definitions.definition: A dyestuff extracted from certain lichens , that changes color when exposed to pH levels greater than or less than certain critical levels.
A simple test of acidity in a liquid using litmus, usually in the form of litmus paper .
A simple test of any attribute; a litmus test .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A dyestuff extracted from certain lichens , that changes color when exposed to pH levels greater than or less than certain critical levels.
secondary_definitions: A simple test of acidity in a liquid using litmus, usually in the form of litmus paper .
A simple test of any attribute; a litmus test .
